titles.title: Authorizing the printing as a House document of a volume consisting of the transcripts of the ceremonial meeting of the House of Representatives and Senate in New York City on September 6, 2002, and a collection of statements by Members of the House of Representatives and Senate from the Congressional Record on the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. Armey asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

reference.ref: wrong version inadvertently printed on 10/10/2002 CR H7885-7886

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/10/2002--Passed House amended. Authorizes the printing as a House document of the transcripts of the ceremonial meeting of the House of Representatives and Senate in New York on September 6, 2002, about the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001.
